1: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַֽחֲרֵיכֵ֡ן <sup>310 </sup> <n>It came to pass after this</n> בָּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> בְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>also [that] the children</n> מוֹאָב֩ <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> וּבְנֵ֨י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> עַמּ֜וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וְעִמָּהֶ֧ם ׀ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>together</n> מֵֽהָעַמּוֹנִ֛ים <sup>5984 </sup> <n>and with them [other] beside the Ammonites</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>against Jehoshaphat</n> לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n>
2: וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Then there came</n> וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>some that told</n> לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָט֙ <sup>3092 </sup> <n>Jehoshaphat</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>There cometh</n> עָלֶ֜יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הָמ֥וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>multitude</n> רָ֛ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>a great</n> מֵעֵ֥בֶר <sup>5676 </sup> <n>against thee from beyond</n> לַיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> מֵאֲרָ֑ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>on this side Syria</n> וְהִנָּם֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> בְּחַֽצְצ֣וֹן תָּמָ֔ר <sup>2688 </sup> <n>and behold they [be] in Hazazontamar</n> הִ֖יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <sup>5872 </sup> <n>which [is] Engedi</n>

8: וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ־ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>And they dwelt</n> בָ֑הּ וַיִּבְנ֨וּ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>therein and have built</n> לְךָ֧ ׀ בָּ֛הּ מִקְדָּ֖שׁ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>thee a sanctuary</n> לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>therein for thy name</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n>
